website_summaries.verdict: One of the largest stroller organizers parents can buy for ultimate functionality and efficiency.
pros: Numerous pockets, compartments, and zippered areas
The two included drink holders are expandable
Holds more items than the typical stroller organizer
Has a pocket with magnetic closure
cons: Many buyers had problems with the cup holders being too small
Tends to slide on stroller bars

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Our stroller is on the smaller side and doesn't offer much storage, there's no secure place/ spot for my phone( has fallen out and cracked more than once now) or keys, and the cup holders are tiny! I used to hate having to use this stroller because of its many flaws but things have definitely changed ever since I ordered this stroller organizer! I love it I can fit so much in it. There's a place for my phone, keys, and water bottles. The mesh part of the organizer is amazing I throw so much in there lol and dont worry about it because its sturdy enough. This is a must have! Stop thinking about it and order it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the straps came undone at the stitching
customer_reviews.text: I really love this for my Mountain Buggy Nano except I used it for the first time on a trip and 3 days in one of the straps came undone at the seam, rendering it useless. I had to carry it around the rest of the day. I think the canvas is too thick to sew with a regular needle, or pin with a standard safety pin. Hoping I can return or get a new one that can last more than 3 days. Aside from that it is a great caddy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my walker! Spacious and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: After hip surgery this has been the perfect accessory to my walker! I can put a sweater or sweatshirt in the mesh bag. Assorted papers, pen etc in other compartments. Drink holder spots are perfect! I put my cell phone in the center front section and my glasses in the second drink holder! After I no longer need it for my walker I can use it on my Grandchild's stroller! I love it! Super sturdy and well made. Zippers go both ways on the spacious horizontal sections. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia C.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Update Oct. 2020 — Just want to come back and say that this bag ROCKS! I mean, it’s a superstar. We’ve had it for almost a year now and it’s still in great condition. It holds so much. I just love it and am so glad I bought it! November 2019 - Like this very much. Lots of storage space. Cup holders expand nicely (just don’t put anything in the zipper compartment behind them). Feels sturdy. Obviously not meant for a lot of heavy items, but that’s fine. We use it for pull-ups, wipes, and a few other lightweight odds and ends. Great bag for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller Accessory
customer_reviews.text: It's a great stroller accessory to have for more space without adding bulk. The straps a bit too short for larger heavy duty strollers. The straps weren't long enough to stretch to the side of the handles for a Graco model we had. Ended up hanging it as close to the sides of the handle as possible. Still worked fine tho. It was a lifesaver in Disneyworld! We jammed all sorts of random things into it.
customer_reviews.author: BubbleMilky

customer_reviews.title: Holds so much!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other versions of stroller organizers but this one is my favorite. It has a small pocket that actually zips, which is great for keys or pacifiers. There are two additional small pouches for things like a phone, toys, a bottle, snacks. The large, mesh hanging pouch will hold a blanket, car seat cover, diapers and a change of clothes or a fabric baby carrier/sling easily. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this organizer. It's the best one out there. It can hold everything in your diaper bag! I feel like I don't even have to carry a big huge diaper bag with this organizer. You can fit diapers and wipes even clothes and toys in the big mesh pocket. The bottle holders are great. And the smaller pockets can hold your essentials. I love that it doesn't have Velcro. Instead it has the clasps which is way more secure. Fits almost any stroller. This is a must have! Thanks, JL Childress!
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Would I have known about this it would have helped me a lot and esp when I went on my previous trip. Instead of always having to bend down and dig into my diaper bag from underneath the stroller, now I can easily put things on it and get it out conveniently and easily. Guess that’s the whole purpose of this right? Great net area to hold jackets, baby blankets. A plus for cup holder and a little area to zip things up. Amazed that it Works on both of my stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not made well. Clips come right off before even loading it.
customer_reviews.text: This was terrible. as I was trying to attach it, the make part of the clip slid right off the left side. I replaced it and then the same thing happened to the right side. This was with nothing in it. once I put stuff in the organizer, it would have fallen right to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyfannn

customer_reviews.title: Good adult storage for any stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great adult storage for any stroller. I love the extra net, i do wish the net was able to fold up if you’re not using it so it wasn’t hanging. And the “cellphone” pocket isn’t deep enough to hold a iPhone 8plus safely. But you can put your cellphone in one of the cup holders of one of the bigger pockets. There is a wide pocket that holds a lot. I was able to put an entire outfit, socks and i have plenty of room to add more in there. The net pocket is pretty large and i can see that it will hold a lot. Overall i recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JennyO

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for our travel stroller for a day at Disneyland. Absolutely perfect. We could fit our drinks, sunscreen, hats, lightweight jackets, hand sanitizer, etc. sturdy enough to hold everything yet lightweight enough to fold up when I retracted the stroller. Love it
customer_reviews.author: C. Coatney

customer_reviews.title: The zippered pockets are nice for keeping valuables hidden and from dropping out unnoticed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new Special Tomato Jogger stroller that doesn't have a parent's tray or storage area. I gave it 4 stars because the cup holders are small and will not hold large cups or water bottles well. However, the straps for the handle bar have locking clasps, offering more secure attachment for heavier loads. The zippered pockets are nice for keeping valuables hidden and from dropping out unnoticed.
customer_reviews.author: sunfloweronion

customer_reviews.title: No go on Bob Single
customer_reviews.text: Hard time with this one. Hate to give a bad review because a “mostly universal” item didn’t fit...still, a second set of straps would have been a good idea. Does not fit on a BOB swivel wheel single stroller. It hangs funny making the console useless.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adaptive stroller/wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for storage on my daughters adaptive stroller/wheelchair. It was perfect. Live the different compartments! Holds the cups up right and fits on the handle bars very well. Love that it’s not bulky so it doesn’t impede folding the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Adolph

customer_reviews.title: Great for umbrella strollers
customer_reviews.text: Great for my umbrella stroller! It held everything and didn’t topple the stroller over from weight. Perfect for Disney. Didn’t use it for cups (which was my initial reason for purchasing) but held plenty of other things and our phones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my double stroller because the basket on the bottom is sort of unreachable especially with kids in it and this thing is fantastic!!! I’m in love!!! I you can tighten to it fits to your stroller and. I love them POCKETS it’s perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown-knowns

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Disney World to go on our umbrella stroller, since the stroller itself doesn't actually have any storage at all. This was a life saver! I was able to keep sunglasses and sunscreen, drinks and snacks, and some extra pull-ups and wipes for our daughter in this bag. There were also a few other things that were crammed in there from time to time. The outer pockets were fine for holding bottles of water, although I probably wouldn't dare to put a drink up in there like the picture shows. It did the job and allowed me to ditch the purse during our trip. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gorrell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and doesn't work with Graco jogger
customer_reviews.text: This does not work well with the Graco fast action jogger as some people tried to tell me it would. The straps are thin and buckles are cheap. When I tightened it to the stroller handle it wouldn't stay tight because the straps were too thin. Then, on my stroller the center console is in the way. If the straps go behind it, then you can't use the pockets. If it goes in front it's right in the way.
customer_reviews.author: J. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our daughter's wheelchair (a Zippie Iris). I love it! I can fit all the things we need to grab in a hurry - sunscreen, antibacterial, tissues, wipes, etc - and can shove her blanket in the bigger mesh pocket. This was worth every penny. Love the convenience of being able to unclip it if needed, and being able to tighten or loosen the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Family

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I hate those big bulky strollers and have always preferred umbrella strollers for my kids. The only downside has been the storage space. I bought this for a trip to Italy when I knew we'd be walking a ton with the stroller but wanted to stick with a lightweight one. This gave my lightweight umbrella stroller the storage and functionality that I needed and was a life saver for the trip. It has come in handy for everything from trips to the beach, the farmers market, and everything in between! I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Zelaya

customer_reviews.title: stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth buying, due to its usefullness. I bought two of these for our trip, and it really help carry things you never thought you would bring. The product is very strong and has good material.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo Brandon

customer_reviews.title: So close to a perfect organizer!
customer_reviews.text: So close to a perfect organizer!! Loved most of the features (zippered pockets, mesh bag, etc.) just an issue of user convenience and better utilization of space. Suggestions- move cup holders to middle, insulate them, and have divided center compartment secured by magnet. Modifiy the back zippered pocket so it is the mesh bag (with zipper access) with ability to rollup and secure excess bag when not needed. (Still allow zippered part to be functional for diapers, etc.) Keep front zippered long pocket and front center. Add small mesh pocket where one cup holder is now and modify one holder to an open padded pocket for sunglasses, etc. Just a thought!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Pockit Plus stroller. Mesh bag is strong and large enough (can fit a magazine for example and more). Lots of zippered pockets and 2 adjustable cup holders. These I didn’t like because when I put a cup in, the whole thing tips with the weight. So unless the lid is sealed, it works. Otherwise, you’ll spill. That would be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: G. NunezTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: paid $18.59 a few days later the price dropped to $12.60. The organizer is okay for the price. I like the large storage area. Doesn't seem like a super nice material but does it's job for the price of $12 I believe it's worth it. Not for $20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing! Fits perfectly on our maclaren triumph stroller. Has 2 cup holders. 2 zipper pockets plus the net. Great for those items you need access to right away or when you don’t want/need to take a big baby bag.
customer_reviews.author: MsL

customer_reviews.title: Good solid organizer
customer_reviews.text: Good solid organizer. I replace about one a year on a heavily used uppababy umbrella stroller. For the use I get out of it, I have no problems replacing once a year. The fit is perfect. There are others out there which may last a bit longer, but carries quite a bit in the pouch, along with a large capacity cut holder (has no problem with sippy cups or coffee to-go cup. The small compartment zipper is perfect for membership cards that you want handy - such as the Zoo. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller/ Wagon Accessory!
customer_reviews.text: We attached this bag to end end of our radio flyer collapsible wagon. We love how much it stores and can be folded up with the wagon. We even used this on the plane and attached to the tray table; so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Just righf
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed. We used this on our umbrella stroller at Disney. We could put things we bought in it. Also carried ponchos for rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I like this organiser a lot. I tend to forget things like my wallet and phone. With this organiser not going to happen anymore. It has pockets for everything. When we go to the park, I just stuff things in there. It can hold 2 bottles,so I put water bottle for older daughter and bottle with breast milk for my newborn son. Also change of clothes,diapers,toys,book for me. I just keep things inside, and there is no need to reattach this organiser!Love it
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Foldable which is perfect to use with umbrella stroller.
customer_reviews.text: My umbrella stroller comes with a basket at the bottom which is not useful as I thought because it's low and I have to take everything out before folding the stroller. So I get this organizer which is foldable and have zippers at each pocket to secure my stuffs not falling out when I folder the stroller. Of course coffee cups have to be removed before folding in case spilling, but milk bottle or zippy cup with lid can stay in there. The large pocket is very large, I have a blanket, wipes, my son's fleece hat and my gloves, and still have room.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Fits so much stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite baby products I own! So much space! I can fit blankets, toys, diapers, wipes, change of clothes, so much stuff! The cup holders stretch to fit larger cups & also work well for cans. There is zippered pockets for keys, phone, ect. I have it on my joovy double stroller & it fits great! Perfect for strollers with little basket storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller organizer ever !
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my cloud double stroller for our recent Disney trip. This is by far the best stroller organizer I have purchased it kept everything organized and at hands reach. The amount it held was fantastic!! It also can be adjusted to fit any stroller single, double and side by side. Wish I found it sooner. Very impressed and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Torres

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for recent Disney trip for stroller...was amazed at how much it held, was sturdy and additional cup holders were great for bottled water along with pockets for phones, wallet, etc.
customer_reviews.author: tamara

customer_reviews.title: does this organizer make life easy! It straps on to your stroller in seconds ...
customer_reviews.text: Man, does this organizer make life easy! It straps on to your stroller in seconds and you just fill it up and go. No need to bring a diaper bag. This allows the stroller to do all the carrying for you! If you were on the fence whether or not to purchase this device don't hesitate, it's great!!!! For the reviewers that were having issues using the cup holders. I'm not sure what size drink you were using but a regular 24 oz water fits in it perfectly once you stretch the elastic a bit.
customer_reviews.author: WaTsKy

customer_reviews.title: excellent, gets the storage job done
customer_reviews.text: This thing was great. We put it on a cheap umbrella stroller for a trip to Disney World. It held plenty of stuff such as four lightweight jackets, my wallet, a couple of water bottles, some snacks, keys, phones, etc. The little zippered compartments at the top would be a good place to secure things like keys or debit cards and the like. I'm very glad I purchased this instead of the more expensive versions. I have three kids and this was one of the best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: T Fam 5

customer_reviews.title: Best.stroller.organizer.ever
customer_reviews.text: Has room for EVERYTHING you could possibly need! Cell phone: check! Wallet: check! Keys: check! Baby toys: check! Bottle/sippy cup: check! Snacks: check! Diapers/wipes: check! Anything else you need: plenty of room left over, diaper bag/purse no longer required! It's easy to use and all your stuff stays secure! Adapts to both my regular and jogging stroller...bought 2 by accident and glad I did lol because they both fold up with organizer still connected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra Convenient Space
customer_reviews.text: This makes it nice that I have everything close at hand and do not have to dig in the basket at the bottom of the carriage. It also helps that I can go without a purse.
customer_reviews.author: pharp

customer_reviews.title: Compartments- yes! Sturdy- not really.
customer_reviews.text: The top part has a lot of compartments but the cup holder is not sturdy enough to put a cup in- but a baby bottle with a cover would be fine. The bottom doesn’t secure to the stroller so it dangles off. Not an issue until you try to fold the stroller up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Makes mom life simple
customer_reviews.text: I love the mesh bag. I don't have to carry a huge diaper bag. I just throw a few diapers and wipes, snacks and a change of clothes in it for my tott. It can fit so much more! Also I love the zippers because I can hide my phone, keys and money in it, Since im not much of a purse person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke after about 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I initially liked this due to all the storage room but I can't believe it broke so fast. I didn't have much weight, either. The most I ever carried was a drink or two in the cup holders and a rain cover in the large carrier. The strap broke due to faulty stitching where one of the straps connect. So this is a nice bag and maybe I got a defective version, but I can't give it a good rating. If it didn't break, I'd give it a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how slim this is and the pockets are a lot bigger then they look in the pictures!! My phone and wallet fit perfectly in the pockets and is so much easier to get a diaper then having to dig I get the stroller!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette James

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have addition to a stroller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Chicco umbrella stroller for my daughter and it came with no cup holders and the basket shouldn't even be called a basket. Maybe a flat diaper would fit in it so I definitely needed something more. This Cups 'N Cargo stroller organizer was the perfect organizer I needed. It has a perfect fit, the compartments are great and the large bag fit toys and clothes and more. I would definitely recommend this to any parent with an umbrella stroller or just want more compartments. With 3 kids, I can never have enough storage compartments. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Frith

customer_reviews.title: I like this perfect for holding essentials however I have 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this perfect for holding essentials however I have 4 stars because my yeti (which is small on the bottom) wouldn’t fit and the whole think ripped forward only useful for water/baby bottle with tops otherwise it’s fine held jackets threw out the mall
customer_reviews.author: Michelle DiAntonio

customer_reviews.title: Shifts from handle
customer_reviews.text: I like that I had a whole bunch of compartments but the straps would come loose so it would always slip on the handle. I have a double stroller contours elite so every time we folded it it got shifted and it was just a little hassle, I am looking for something more snug.
customer_reviews.author: DeLane Perez Silva

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, my husband usually doesn't say much when it comes to things I purchase, but it sure made a comment about this and raved about it. He couldn't believe how much it held, how many pockets there where (with or without closures) and was not bulky at all. We had diapers, wipes, sweaters, bottles, toys, straws, keys, phone, camera, drinks, on and on. We did't realize how much stuff we put in it throughout the day until we unloaded the items. THIS IS A MUST! Not cheaply made either.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo09

customer_reviews.title: This is so great to hook on to your umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is so great to hook on to your umbrella stroller. It is light weight. Has some covered pockets for privacy but the netting allows you to see what's there. You can load it up and it doesn't cause your stroller to fall backwards from the weight.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: awesome for an umbrella stroller that needs more cargo space
customer_reviews.text: awesome for an umbrella stroller that needs more cargo space!!! fits large cups as well such as my daughters camelbak water cup so not sure why people say cupholders arnt big enough! fits them all except if ure trying to put an extra large 7-11 gulp cup
customer_reviews.author: eleni

customer_reviews.title: Fits our Chicco Echo Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful since the storage for that stroller is minimal. Folds up with the stroller, no problems! Also, previous reviewers had said that the cup holders were too small, NOT SO on mine! They fit baby bottles and water bottles and cups--completely fine! If you have a stroller like the one in the photo-- or Chicco Echo this will be grand! If your handles are one bar, or have a molded plastic topper or something, I can imagine getting to this bag would be much trickier. Very excited to use this for our upcoming trip! I'll post again if there's anything to amend.
customer_reviews.author: OnionLass

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy things!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller organizer, holds a good amount of things, but beware don't put anything heavy in it! ( like a laptop ) I made a stupid mistake of carrying too many things inside it and it snapped after a month or so of using it, I won't give a negative feedback because it was my own fault, I will of course fix it and keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: cup holders are lame
customer_reviews.text: This storage bag fits well on my stroller and has lots of little pockets for stuff and the big pocket is very nice, but the cup holders are really only good for slim plastic water bottles that you don't need to take in and out often. My steel water bottle barely fits in there and it takes two hands to put it back in the holder so I cannot safely stroll and take sips. You could not put a paper coffee cup in this as it would get squished by the tight elastic.
customer_reviews.author: V. Beecher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller organizer.
customer_reviews.text: This item is amazing. I love it. But, I lost it then I ended buying another one cause i just have to have one because I love how it is. Definitely recommend it for strollers.
customer_reviews.author: ISLANDGIRL03

customer_reviews.title: This is so much better than buying official name brand cup holders that are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than buying official name brand cup holders that are available for strollers. It had plenty of space in its 2 zippered pockets to hold cell phones and keys, the cup holders are sufficient and the mesh pocket is nice and large- you don't need a diaper bag if you don't want. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It really is not as sturdy as I hoped... and I think it wont last too long. If you arent carryong a lot then it would be ok
customer_reviews.author: Giselita

customer_reviews.title: Fits our Chicco Echo perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This fit our stroller perfectly, and it hold as much if not more than our diaper bag. My only complaint is that you cannot fit larger drinks in the cup holder. They work well for bottled water and such though. The mesh bag is large, and it closes with a snap. There are also two smaller zipped pockets on either side of the mesh bag. There is so much storage, and it is easy to add to/remove from our stroller.
customer_reviews.author: AshlyA

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller organizer. It works very well for our Chicco Lite stroller. I love the zipper compartments. It can hold a small wallet, keys, phone, etc. The mesh part is nice to toss bibs or burp cloths in quickly.
customer_reviews.author: discotae

customer_reviews.title: Made our light weight stroller perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a light weight stroller(not an umbrella) which had lots of great features except the adult cup holder would not stay on stroller, especially when folded to store. The stroller also lacked a place to put cell phone & keys that was quickly accessible. I was so excited to receive this J.L. Children Cups 'N Cargo Stroller Organizer and find that it worked as advertised!!! Bravo, we love it, so glad I took a chance and ordered it, no regrets for this happy owner! :)
customer_reviews.author: NanaX1

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, but it so deep and has so much storage I feel like I’m losing things!
customer_reviews.author: Randikay13

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: Has so many pockets. I use it on my umbrella stroller and it carries all our drinks when we are at the theme parks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great. Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Just what we need. Plenty of zippered pockets for wipes, napkins, loose change, and it fits snugly over the handles. Not bulky at all and stores with the stroller when it's folded. The cup holders are elastic, so not spill-proof if you hit a bump, but they do the trick with bottles/bottle water, tervis, etc.
customer_reviews.author: emilahoo

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great addition to have with my umbrella stroller. We used it in Disney and it was perfect. It held everything we needed and the see through mesh made it very easy to find things. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Jeep umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great for our Jeep umbrella stroller! Holds a lot and easy to put on the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of this company before having kiddos but now I find their stuff to be so sturdy and economical. I love this product because it fits every stroller (i rotate it between my strollers), has several zippered and magnetic close pockets and is big enough to carry what I need. The drink compartment isn't the best but it holds a water bottle or travel coffee cup pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: mauve

customer_reviews.title: This bag is fantastic for all of the necessities we must keep with ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic for all of the necessities we must keep with us on the back of our disabled grandson's wheelchair/stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my trip to Disney World with grandchildren excellent very convenient holds many things
customer_reviews.author: rosey

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for holding drinks
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for holding drinks, keys, phone and the few things you need frequently while out and about. Fit on my stroller nicely and worked well for a day at the zoo!
customer_reviews.author: J. Earl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect added storage to my stroller
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this. It fit so good everyone thought it was part of the stroller. It was prefect
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Mensah

customer_reviews.title: Every umbrella stroller needs one
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller organizer. Great for quick day trips. Hides my keys, wallet & phone in zip pockets. Holds 2 reasonably sized drinks. Days worth of diaper, wipes, snacks, coats. Folds down to nothing when not in use (great for travel). It's awesome. I just shared the link for this item to 2 other moms and thought I should write a review.
customer_reviews.author: Powpow

customer_reviews.title: ... have given it 5 stars for it being very useful and has plenty of space to store so many ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars for it being very useful and has plenty of space to store so many things however, after using it for a day, i notice dthat the mesh part of the product has a hole in it. I can't return it because i brought it overseas and won't be coming back to the USA anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: bdg

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Súper convivient when baby is asleep and can’t use a store cart. I used this to save my purchases and also great to carry baby stuffs
customer_reviews.author: liliana lopez

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: I have a lightweight stroller that doesnt have any cup holders or anything or that sort. This fits perfectly over the handles and it holds a lot! The cup holders are very spacious and I had no problem fitting a venti iced Starbucks drink in them. Nothing spilled out.
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 4 different organizers and these one by far is my favorite! So many pockets for storage and folds well when the stroller folds, which is key. Absolutely love the long mesh backing, so much storage!!!! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dana DiBiccari

customer_reviews.title: Will work great for umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: Good size & fit for umbrella stroller. Good price for the quality. Cup holders fit my contigo water bottles. The magnetic clasp looks like it might come off before long, but not a big deal I guess. Wish I ordered two but wasn’t sure if I’d like it.
customer_reviews.author: Wheeler.A

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I just add some clips at te bottom to be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at the outset but it quickly fell apart
customer_reviews.text: At first I was happy with this product and wrote a positive review. Sadly I have to update this and say that the product didn't last long. One of the straps detached after about 6 weeks and I sewed it back on. Then after another couple of months I had to do the same with another strap. After 4 months the entire thing fell apart. In other words, it's not durable. It's a shame because I loved it while it lasted. Maybe I was just carrying too much stuff in it...
customer_reviews.author: FloridaChillinMom

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Love this. No need for a diaper bag with this. I can fit in as much as I need for one kid for a day. Love that it zips so dont have to worry about small things falling out when folding my stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Attach, fill, and away we go!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this simple and lightweight, yet versatile and sturdy stroller organizer! At first I didn't think it would hold up to my crazy, double stroller, total of four kids life style, but so far it has rolled with all of our punches;) I love the mesh pouch portion of organizer. I can stuff that portion full, yet still see all the items, and everything is easily accessible!
customer_reviews.author: charityadair

customer_reviews.title: Practical for other purposes besides a stroler.
customer_reviews.text: End up buying 3 of these! Repurposed to use on my giant folding shopping cart, laundry cart & my dad's rollator. Used mini zip ties to secure the the mesh net to the carts to give it more support & so that the mesh material has less play/give so it won't get caught onto something & get ripped.
customer_reviews.author: CrlMac1

customer_reviews.title: Not a good option for waterbottles
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with the organizer. I purchased it to have easy access to my water bottle and phone. My water bottle was a pretty standard 24 oz plastic bottle and it made the entire organizer tip inwards when I had it in the cup holder. All the pockets were then laying horizontal making anything in the front pouches fall out and my water bottle to fall out as well. The straps also didn't stay tight and slipped out of the buckles making the organizer hang loose. I also found the buckles to be in the way when pushing.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Using this on an umbrella stroller. This fits 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this on an umbrella stroller. This fits 2 sodas and all the diapers and wipes we need for on the go. Make sure to keep something in the stroller whether it be your kid or a bag or something. When there is items in this organizer the stroller gets top heavy and will tip.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wojtaszek

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It does it purpose. I just wish the cup holders were not so tight and it wasn't see threw. Able to close my umbrella stroller with it being still attached. However; it does stick out a bit, but not to bad. It does hold quit a bit of stuff. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Took To Disney was wonderful!! Fits so Much and held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product fit real nicely on the back of our stroller! I was skeptical about the cup holders, thinking it wouldn't hold the cups right, but they fit real nicely. No spills! :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a bit. My big complaint are the cup holders. They are fine for bottle soda or cans. But as soon as you put in a 32 ounce cup from a gas station or Burger King the whole organizer collapses. That is the only reason I give it a bad review. I bought it specifically to carry large sodas while walking around places I cant carry my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Blake

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This stroller organizer is just ok. I can tell that the magnet that holds the mesh bag together is going to rip soon. Also, there is no way you could fit a cup that size (Carl's jr in the picture) into the cup holder. I put my sunglasses in one of the cup holders and my phone in the other.
customer_reviews.author: Youry Choi

customer_reviews.title: Best one we've used.
customer_reviews.text: this organizer is one of the best that I've used! The cupholder's can hold very decent sized water bottles, and baby bottles. Having the extra storage that hangs down is also really nice. We can put the kids jackets, toys, blankets, etc. in there without having to go to the bottom storage compartment in the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Saved116

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. So helpful it keeps everything organized. I love to travel light so this makes it so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Henders

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had purchased on of these for my previous trips
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on my 10+ year old stroller that the cup holder thingy had broken on. We used it for our Disney trip and it worked great. The cup holders are to small to put a cup in but hold a bottle of water great and probably would hold one of those metal water bottles well. There was plenty of space to hold our books and all of our souvineirs and stuff like that. Honestly I wish I had had this for years on my previous trips, it worked great. I left the stroller there but brought this home with me to pass on to someone who could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Arter Thompson II

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in many ways
customer_reviews.text: great utility net. You can actually see what you are looking for. Several pocket organizers for all the little stuff and your walten and phone, if you are not carrying a purse. Easily detaches and attaches and just just the perfect width.
customer_reviews.author: CHRATCAL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect size for everything we need! We've used it on the stroller everyday for the past two weeks and it's awesome to not have to lug around her bulky diaper bag when we are just going to the park or somewhere quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Gemberling

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE this! Works perfectly with all my strollers. Recently took it on a big trip with the kiddo, and it was a great way to stash just about anything and keep me hands free. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Popkess

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect organizer for my daughter's wheelchair. Attaches close to the back of the seat so it doesn't stick out too far. It also is very roomy and has space for all her essentials. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky V.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this for travel. Still use it for home.
customer_reviews.text: This made our vacation so much easier. We had extra room to carry our souvenirs, diaoers, wipea etc. The front small pocket is great for keys, phone, debit card, easI'll accessible. Love the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi K.

customer_reviews.title: Flops around a little but okay
customer_reviews.text: It has enough pockets to store everything (though NO, you cannot put your coffee into the cup holder because IT WILL SPILL). The bottom of it does not tie to anything which is pretty annoying. It just hangs from the handles - so, for example, when you close the stroller, it gets in the way. But it does the job okay.
customer_reviews.author: J. Selmeci

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful idea...super useful!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is the best when using a small light umbrella stroller. Two drink holders, a couple smaller pockets including one that zippers closed, and a large main compartment made of netting that holds TONS of stuff! The only problem I've had is that when the stroller is empty it sometimes topples backward, but only because I shoved too much stuff in there...LOVE this product :)
customer_reviews.author: MommaJBeans

customer_reviews.title: It provides Good storage on my stroller
customer_reviews.text: It provides Good storage on my stroller. The only issue I have is that it slips down the handle bars.
customer_reviews.author: Cheli

customer_reviews.title: It was nice to have the extra cup holder and the mesh ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our trip to Disney. It was nice to have the extra cup holder and the mesh bag to hold any snacks or jackets. The zippered pockets were nice to keep your cell phone in. I'm so glad we bought this. It really kept us from having to hold everything the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Works out great
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter's stroller and provides ample storage space on the stroller. Good use for theme parks and zoos. Would recommend to other mothers who are looking for a stroller organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Camille M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to our stroller. Searched and found this the best option
customer_reviews.author: Stinsonator

customer_reviews.title: The organizer for me
customer_reviews.text: I love it love it love it. I put my 3 boys sweatshirts in the mesh bag and I put a bottle in one cup holder a cup in another and my sons sprite bottle in the little pocket they showed for the cell phone only the bottom of the bottle fit in but it held it in on our walk home and we live on a hill!!! mom of 7 definitely recommend this product!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morena

customer_reviews.title: Made my cheap $20 umbrella stroller so much better!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured! Bought this to put on my very cheap $20 transit umbrella stroller. You know which ones I’m talking about. Because of baby his product, it made commuting on the bus soooooo much better.
customer_reviews.author: Peyzel

product_meta.title: J.L. Childress Cups 'N Cargo, Universal Fit Stroller Organizer with Extra Large Storage, Expandable Deep Cup Holders, Multiple Zippered Pockets, Unique Large Mesh Bag for Larger Items, Black
product_meta.description:
Parents can stay super organized while on the go with the Cups N Cargo by J.L. Childress. The Cups N Cargo is a functionally designed stroller organizer for diapering, feeding and personal needs. It features two expandable front pockets for bottles, cups or sodas. A zippered front pocket with reflective trim holds cell phone, keys, pacifiers and more. Two long zippered pockets diapering needs and more. The easy view mesh pocket stores large or wet items. The Cups N Cargo attaches to all strollers with adjustable buckle straps and features a magnetic top closure.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Parents can stay super organized while on-the-go with the Cups ‘N Cargo by J.L. Childress. The Cups ‘N Cargo is a functionally designed stroller organizer for diapering, feeding and personal needs. It features two expandable front pockets for bottles, cups or sodas. A zippered front pocket with reflective trim holds cell phone, keys, pacifiers and more. Two long zippered pockets diapering needs and more. The easy-view mesh pocket stores large or wet items. The Cups ‘N Cargo attaches to all strollers with adjustable buckle straps and features a magnetic top closure.
feature_bullets: Functionally-designed universal stroller organizer that keeps all of your diapering, feeding and personal needs organized and within easy reach
Features 2 expandable cup holders, 3 zippered pockets and one flat front pocket

Thoughtfully designed and manufactured by J.L. Childress - delivering high-quality products that are practical and multi-functional for over 30 years. From our family to yours, Travel Happy! #travelhappy #jlchildress #familytravel
Hold more! Large mesh compartment holds jackets, blankets, extra clothing, diapers, toys and more
Zippered pockets ensure that all cargo stays secure, even when folding your stroller. Magnetic closure keeps mesh compartment closed

Adjustable buckle straps attach to all styles and designs of strollers including UPPAbaby, Baby Jogger, Britax, BOB, Graco, nuna, Maclaren, Bugaboo, Babyzen, Bumbleride, Cybex, Inglesina, Joovy, Mountain Buggy and all others
